title: Nuclear Arms Control Era Comes to End Amid Global Rush for New Weapons
summary_full: Beijing, Moscow and shaken American allies are seeking new warheads as President Trump ends more than a half century of nuclear arms control with Russia.
summary_public: Beijing, Moscow and shaken American allies are seeking new warheads as President Trump ends more than a half century of nuclear arms control with Russia.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Moscow and shaken American allies are seeking new warheads
